oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Poets and Prophets program - Sonny Throckmorton - 2013-07-20
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Poets and Prophets program with songwriter Sonny Throckmorton from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on July 20, 2013
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sonny Throckmorton;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hosted by Michael Gray. Recording begins in progress. Includes selected recordings and audio from video. Performances include; If We're Not Back In Love By Monday (with Scotty Emerick); What I Had With You (with Scotty Emerick); I Wish I Was Eighteen Again (with Rhonda Throckmorton and Scotty Emerick); Safely In The Arms Of Jesus (with Rhonda Throckmorton and Scotty Emerick); Unidentified Song possibly Ride Me Back Home (written with daughter Debby); The Cowboy Rides Away (with Rhonda Throckmorton and Scotty Emerick);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Throckmorton, Sonny; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
